head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths POLSKIN, HERBERT C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths POLSKIN, HERBERT C.

block.p: POLSKIN-Herbert C., 79 years, of Monroe Township, NJ on Friday, August 25, 2000. Devoted husband of 55 years to Joan Klein Polskin. Beloved father of Howard and Philippa Polskin, Emily & Maurice Zylber, and Judi & Michael Knopke. Adored grandfather of six. Services Sunday 1:00 PM in Mount Sinai Memorial Chapels, East Brunswick, New Jersey.
